Episodes.Title: The Xindi
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise has been in the Delphic Expanse for six weeks and have yet to get any intel about the Xindi. Strange anomalies affect the ship, sending cargo flying violently through the bays, pockets of atmosphere losing gravity and o...

Episodes.Title: Anomaly
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After an attack by Osaarian pirates, Enterprise follows them to a mysterious sphere.

Episodes.Title: Extinction
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer, Reed and Sato are transformed into aliens while visiting a planet.

Episodes.Title: Rajiin
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise helps an alien woman, Rajiin, seeking to escape her life as a sex slave. Once on board she uses her alien abilities to gather biometric data about humans and is recaptured by her employers, the Xindi council.

Episodes.Title: Impulse
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise answers a distress signal from a stranded Vulcan ship, only when arriving they find the ship completely desolate, wrecked - and filled with Vulcan zombies.

Episodes.Title: Exile
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Hoshi Sato is contacted by a 400-year-old telepathic alien exiled on planet in the Expanse, shunned by his society because of his abilities. The alien offers to use his powers to help Enterprise find the Xindi and the weapon they ...

Episodes.Title: The Shipment
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise follows a lead and discovers a Xindi lab that refines Kemocite, the key ingredient in the weapon being built to destroy Earth. An away team of Archer, Reed and Hayes confront the lead researcher, Gralik Durr, who was em...

Episodes.Title: Twilight
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: His memory crippled, Archer awakens years in the future, after the Xindi have reduced Earth to a cinder and the remnants of humanity have settled on a distant planet. Now, Archer learns that he may be the key to undoing this tragedy.

Episodes.Title: North Star
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise investigates a previously unknown colony of humans who are living in the fashion of the American Old West. They are oppressing an alien race called the Skagarans.

Episodes.Title: Similitude
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer decides to make a fast-growing clone of Trip to help save his life while Enterprise is stranded in a dangerous field with nucleonic particles.

Episodes.Title: Carpenter Street
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer and T'Pol travel back in time to Detroit in 2004 to stop three Xindi-Reptilians from constructing a bioweapon.

Episodes.Title: Chosen Realm
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise is taken over by religious zealots who want to use the ship in a war against heretics.

Episodes.Title: Proving Ground
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise has found the location of the testing site of the Xindi weapon and gets some rather unexpected help.

Episodes.Title: Stratagem
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer and the Xindi Degra are in a shuttle. With Degra suffering from memory loss, Archer tells him they escaped together from a prison and that the Insectoids took power after destroying Earth.

Episodes.Title: Harbinger
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: With Reed and Hayes fighting over a training program and Trip seemingly making T'Pol jealous, Enterprise discovers a dying alien in a pod with technology similar to the Spheres.

Episodes.Title: Doctor's Orders
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: While in command of Enterprise because the entire crew is in a coma, Dr. Phlox starts hearing some strange sounds.

Episodes.Title: Hatchery
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Captain Archer orders the crew of Enterprise to save a Xindi-Insectoid hatchery.

Episodes.Title: Azati Prime
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer decides he should pilot a kamikaze shuttle to destroy the Xindi weapon. Temporal agent Daniels urges him to reconsider.

Episodes.Title: Damage
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Captain Archer has been returned to Enterprise by the Xindi council awaiting a hearing. But after a heavy attack by the Reptilians, Enterprise is stranded without a functional warp drive. They meet another ship in trouble because ...

Episodes.Title: The Forgotten
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: As the crew continues to repair the ship and mourn the dead, Archer works to create trust and form a partnership with members of the Xindi council.

Episodes.Title: E²
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Trying to pass through a subspace corridor, Enterprise is stopped by a version of itself from the future.

Episodes.Title: The Council
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise has arrived at the location of the Xindi Council and with the help of Degra, Archer can make his plea in front of the five races of Xindi. Archer needs to prove that the Sphere Builders have been telling lies. While the...

Episodes.Title: Countdown
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: While the Reptilians force Hoshi to decipher a launch code, the Primates, Arboreals and Archer think of a way to stop the Xindi weapon.

Episodes.Title: Zero Hour
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer takes Degra's ship to try to prevent Earth from being destroyed and gets some unexpected help. Enterprise tries to destroy Sphere 41, but the Sphere Builders know about the plan.
